allowList.title: Allow List
allowList.description: A list of fields to allow from the returned payload - works like a white list.

blockList.title: Block List
blockList.description: A list of fields to block or exclude from the returned payload - overrides the allow list.

responsePolicy.title: Response Policy
responsePolicy.description: If the blocked fields are found in the content, you can choose to block the payload and return an error, mask the field values, or remove the blocked fields from the response.
